name: E J Consultants (London) Limited
goal:
EJ Consultants is business consultancy which explains, in easy to understand terms, how eID and Trust can be utilised for stakeholder benefit in both private and public sectors. Jon Shamah is the Principal Consultant and he brings a wealth of knowledge, both technical (PKI, IDM etc) and commercial.

Applicable to all levels of management, EJ Consultants reduces complex methodologies and processes into concepts that the non-technical can understand and absorb. We help facilitate the 'Light-Bulb Moment' so that board level can take informed decisions and see the vision of eID.

EJ Consultants works in both Public and Private sectors across the entire EU and participates on numerous EU funded projects.
interests: Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: All Trust, Cyber-Security and Privacy issues, especially eIDAS, eID and NIS. Also IOT related.
